verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Adam fell and we fell in him ages ago
Death and sin had entered in the world, and so
God sent down His Son for us;
Victory He won for us.
Hallelujah. (repeat 3x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God looked down upon the world and evil He saw;
Through the sons of Israel He gave us the Law
But the standard was too high for us
So Jesus came and died for us.
Hallelujah. (repeat 3x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Some day Jesus will return to take us all home;
We will be content to praise Him all the day long
"Worthy is the Lamb!" we'll sing
Praising Jesus Christ our King.
Hallelujah. (repeat 3x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
So until that glorious day we're here amongst men
Holding Jesus' testimony until He comes again,
Deep in Christ abiding,
In His life we're hiding.
Hallelujah.
